title: Vera Memphis
blurb: Randomly generated Vera Molnár and Memphis mashups on [Glitch](https://vera-memphis.glitch.me) inspired by a Tim Holman [tutorial](https://generativeartistry.com/tutorials/un-deux-trois/) at Generative Artistry.

title: Local Memory: A History of Music in Austin
blurb: An ongoing public history project presenting a cultural geography of music performance in Austin, Texas.

title: Gentse Deuren
blurb: I’m taking photos of (mostly) storefronts most days during the year we’re living in Gent. Playing with Gatsby and React.

title: Islands Division
blurb: Small island mirage animations on [Glitch](https://islands-division.glitch.me) inspired by a Tim Holman [tutorial](https://generativeartistry.com/tutorials/joy-division/) at Generative Artistry.
